animeTitle: Heart no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Wonder World
animeDescription: The girly but bloody otome game re-imagining of Lewis Carroll's classic fantasy novel Alice's Adventures in Wonderland with bishounen characters and added romance.A parody of Alice's Adventures in Wonderland where Alice is smart and non-doormatlike.In this story, Alice is not all what she seems. She is practical, strong, yet darkly cynical. Instead of the tradition story, Alice is kidnapped unwillingly by a mysterious (yet somewhat bishie-looking) man with bunny ears into a place call Heartland. Stuck in Heartland due to a trick by the mysterious bunny eared man, she meets the residents of this world. Along the way, Alice meets Blood, handsome mafia leader; Ace, the psycho yet charming knight and more... What should Alice do in such a world!?(Source: MU)
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Heart no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Wonder World']
